name: Jumpin' Jack
description:
This is a Halloween arcade game about hoppin', boppin', and getting candy into the hole.

Android is the target platform, however you can play with a mouse or touchscreen on other devices.

Enter your name in the pause menu to be added to the leaderboard!

Still in active development, looking for feedback.

Upcoming Features:

* Better Leaderboards

* Character Skins

* Power-ups

* Background Music

* Boss Stage

* Bonus Stage

* And More?
